summary: Claude Pro Cost Check: Subscription Covers Usage

message.content: 今あなたはObsidianのMCPサーバーと連携できていますか？できている場合，参照しているVaultにあるCoding Guideline.mdのパスを教えて下さい．

content.text:
I don't have access to Obsidian's MCP server or any Obsidian Vault from this environment. I'm currently working in a local Python project directory at `/Users/kaito/dev/py/fix-md-for-obsidian/` and can only access the files within this project.

If you need to work with Obsidian notes or access a Coding Guideline.md file, you would need to either:
1. Copy the relevant files into this project directory
2. Set up the Obsidian MCP server connection separately

The current project appears to be a Python tool for fixing Markdown files, possibly for Obsidian compatibility based on the name.
